    "formula": [
        "From _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 08 2022: (Start)",
        "a(n) = Sum_{j=0..8} (-1)^j*binomial(2*n+1, j)*binomial(10-j, 2)^n.",
        "G.f. and e.g.f. are in the file \"Generating functions\". (End)"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "With[{B=Binomial}, Table[Sum[(-1)^j*B[2n+1,j]*B[10-j,2]^n, {j,0,8}], {n, 30}]] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 08 2022 *)"
    ],
